name: FISHSLAP
description:
Those evil fishermen want to capture and EAT your fishy friends!

Slap those guys in the head to distract them, and allow your fishy pals to escape!

Just tap the screen. Timing is of the essence.

Arcade mayhem, power-ups, mystical golden fish and fish frenzy!

YouTube game play:

(originally created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare challenge)
